name: swapcat-subgraph-realt
description: Swapcat subgraph only for RealT tokens

scripts.deploy:eth: yarn codegen:eth && yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ realtoken-thegraph/swapcat-eth
scripts.deploy:xdai: yarn codegen:xdai && yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ realtoken-thegraph/swapcat-xdai

author: Jycssu
